info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:12PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong and Erratic Winds... Scattered thunderstorms were moving to the east across portions of Central and North Central Montana this afternoon at between 25 and 35 mph. Strong and erratic wind gusts of between 40 to 50 mph have been common with these thunderstorms, in addition to small hail up to the size of half of an inch and occasional cloud to ground lightning strikes. Those working or recreating outdoors should be prepared to seek shelter should thunderstorms approach. Travelers should be prepared for strong cross winds, regardless of if a thunderstorm is present as these storms are producing outflow boundaries that are propagating to great distances away from the parent thunderstorm.
